docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Requirements Investment Themes Accurate Learning Center Usage Metrics Epics Student Sign-In Learning Center Reporting Features Student Classroom Sign-In Student In-Room Sign-In Learning Center Report Generation Stories As a student, I can sign in to the percopo classroom so that I can receive help from a tutor. As a student, I can sign in when I arrive at a tutor's room so that I can receive help from a tutor. As a learning center employee, I can generate reports about classroom usage. Nonfunctional Requirements The system must authenticate users and provide authorized access to reporting information (NFR).
